text: Mazima twasenza abaana ba Israil mu kifo e kirungi ekyesiimisa netubagabirira mu bigabwa ebirungi, nebataba na njawukana (mu ddiini) okutuusa okumanya lwe kwabajjira (nti Nabbi Muhammad ajja kujja nga mubaka wa Katonda) mazima Katonda agenda kulamula wakati wa bwe ku lunaku lw'enkomerero mu ekyo kye baali baawukanamu
